Abashing Stab.name: Abashing Stab
Abashing Stab.flavor: With words or body language, you mock your foe as you deliver a cutting attack.
Abashing Stab.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Abashing Stab.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is marked until the start of your next turn. Until the start of your next turn, the target takes a â€“2 penalty to attack rolls against you but gains a +5 bonus to damage rolls against you.

Mocking Footwork.name: Mocking Footwork
Mocking Footwork.flavor: A derisive combat style keeps foes off balance.
Mocking Footwork.effect: Until the stance ends, each time you hit an enemy that you have combat advantage against, you can either shift 1 square or slide the enemy 1 square.

Cutting Assault.name: Cutting Assault
Cutting Assault.flavor: Your scornful manner puts your foe on the defensive, allowing you to make a sharp follow-up.
Cutting Assault.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Cutting Assault.onHit: The target is weakened and slowed (save ends both).
Cutting Assault.onMiss: The target is slowed until the end of its next turn.
Cutting Assault.effect: Make a secondary attack against the target. The target is then marked until the end of the encounter, until you are knocked unconscious, or until another mark supersedes this one.
Cutting Assault.secondaryAttack: Dexterity vs. Reflex. If the primary attack hit, you have combat advantage against the target.
